‚ö™ Í∏∞Ïà†Ï†Å Ï†ÑÌôòÏ†ê: FCN (Fully Convolutional Networks)

‚ö™ FCNÏùò Íµ¨Ï°∞

1) Convolution LayerÎ•º ÌÜµÌï¥ Feature Ï∂îÏ∂ú

‚ö™ ÎßàÎ¨¥Î¶¨ÌïòÎ©∞

‚ÄúOur key insight is to build ‚Äòfully convolutional‚Äô networks that take input of arbitrary size and produce correspondingly-sized output with efficient inference and learning.‚Äù
